about_the_game:
Set in a reclusive and quiet little Inn, you step into the role of a struggling gumshoe detective tasked to investigate a mysterious disappearance. This will lead you into a deadly game of wits against a cadre of succubi who want nothing more than to drain you dry.

Use your investigative abilities to uncover the fates of past guests while you seek to work out a final escape from the horrific situation.
Time is not your friend in this world; will you unravel the mystery and find the door, or become another "guest" who never found his way home?




  • Villainesses: You'll come into contact with unique and captivating demons, each with their own personalities, backgrounds and personal motivations.
  • Tense Atmosphere: From music to lightning, the game maintains a relentlessly tense and suspenseful atmosphere of stress and menace. The player stays on the edge as the navigate the bowels of the Elysium Inn.
  • Day and Night Cycle: We utilize a dynamic day and night cycle. The hotel and all of its denizens will go about their daily tasks, just as if you weren't there. Learn their habits and activities in order to survive.
  • Puzzle Solving: Engage in a number of thought-provoking puzzle-solving gameplay that will challenge your ability to make leaps of logic. Brain power will be essential if you wish to uncover the Inn's secrets and find a way out!



Lily is the epitome of what happens when an ancient succubus leans into modern technology; fully embracing the power of modernity and social media to meet her ends. She conceals her true identity behind a Vtuber avatar, while still having access to tens of thousands of adoring followers, captivating them and draining everything she can from their wallets for just a fleeting moment of her attention. As one of the few people who get to meet her in person, you can only hope you'll escape her notice.


A surface-level look at Morrigan shows a hardworking, professional manager of the Elysium Inn. Externally, her kind and gentle demeanor makes hearts melt in her hands. In reality, this is all a mask to hide her true self; a lurking, sadistic succubus that revels in the thrills of drawing maximum dread and despair from her victims.
Her repertoire of vicious sarcasm, ruthless mockery and cruel mind games make her prey feel a sense of hopelessness that she drinks like the finest vintage.



Vilinaela presents as a charming and bubbly maid with a submissive demeanor and radiant, joyful smile. But, as is the common MO of the succubus, this is nothing but a thin veneer, hiding her true self: a vicious predator skilled in manipulation.
She enjoys toying with humans, attempting to draw out their trust and imprison their hearts. By the time the victim sees her true, hedonistic nature, it is far too late. By then, most men are so thoroughly ensnared that they willingly offer their lives for a chance of just a taste of the pleasure she has to offer.


Sora is an enigma that appears strikingly out of place within the confines of this strange and ancient Inn. She carries a profound sense of gravity and sorrow, hinting at a history steeped in disappointment and loss. Despite her intriguing presence, it's highly unlikely that she'd show her innermost heart to a pathetic human like you.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game has adult themes, adult language, and fictional characters depicted in pornographic situations, and performing hardcore / nonconsensual sexual acts with human and fantasy characters. All characters depicted are over the age of 21 an above.

Themes in this game include:

> Risqué outfits, sexual comments and lewd situations
> Full female nudity and sex
> Strong language and alcohol
> Consensual and non-consensual sex
> Depictions of Slavery and Bondage
> Depictions of the consumption of alcohol

name: Situation Succ: Inn Elysium

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Window 10 64-bit +
  • Processor: Intel i5 2.3GHz or AMD A9 2.9GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX) compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

steam_germany.descriptors:
Sexualisierte Gewalt / Sexual violence
Drastische Gewalt
Derbe Sprache

short_description: Situation Succ is a Dark-Fantasy game with a mythos inspired in part by both Asian and Western occult influences. As a detective who finds himself trapped inside an ancient inn by four evil entities, you have to use your wits and investigative abilities to try and escape.
